title: Remco Evenepoel Lights Up Final Tour de France Mountain Stage: ‘We Can Be Proud We Tried’
content:
Third-placed Belgian reflects on foiled attacks as Vingegaard proves stronger; Soudal Quick-Step team boss Lefevere says Evenepoel has silenced critics with his Tour performances.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Lights Up Final Tour de France Mountain Stage: ‘We Can Be Proud We Tried’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
